nav.div: West St. Paul - Mendota Heights - Eagan Area Schools (District 197) » News and Events » Homepage News » Coronavirus (COVID-19) Updates

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: font-size: 11pt; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
background-color: transparent; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);
span.span: For the COVID-19 resource page, which includes other updates and resources, please click here. Para COVID-19 en Español, haga clic aquí.

span.style: font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: Today at 2 p.m., Minnesota Governor Tim Walz announced that schools will remain closed for the rest of the 2019-2020 school year. While we may have suspected this news would come, it is still tough to hear. We miss being with you already and now we know for sure it will be longer before we can be face-to-face again.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: My heart goes out to each of you, especially our seniors. You may know that my oldest child is a senior in high school and I am wrestling with this with each of you. I also know that it’s not just the seniors. We are all mourning some things we need to sacrifice as we fight this virus. We were looking forward to plays, concerts, celebrations, athletic competitions, and so much more, that will not take place. In addition, we know the ongoing situation includes very real and significant struggles for our families. Challenges with food, shelter, mental health, and childcare are a reality for too many of our families and we will continue to support them as best we can.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: In the midst of that, I want you to know what WILL continue. Our commitment to each other will continue. Our commitment to make this the best experience possible (given the circumstances) we can for you—our students and families—will continue. We will continue to find new and better ways to connect with you across the distance. Finally, our partnership—where we all work together on behalf of our students—will continue.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: Though there are not many new details about the distance learning plan to share today, we will keep you informed as we learn more. We know you have questions about summer school, graduation, and other things. We know more now, but we still need to hear a bit more about the specific rules we will need to follow before we can finalize decisions.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);
font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

p.span: So please know that as we work through the finer details of what this closure means for our community, we will keep all of you in mind and keep in touch with you to ensure you know what will be doing to continue to support you and your children. We are—and remain—Warriors.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; line-height: 1.38; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;

span.style: white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);

background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; font-family: Arial; font-size: 13px; color: rgb(89, 89, 89);
